messages.content: Yes, I had a guy kicking in my door or trying to kick in my front door. I don't know what his problem was. My wife woke me up and said somebody was trying to kick in the door. I looked out the window and told him to go away. He kept trying to kick the door in. So I opened the door to see what his problem was because he looked kind of drunk and he charged me. I had my firearm. I told him to stop. He took off his shirt and then charged me again so I shot him.
Okay. Is he inside your house now?
Yes, he charged me and went back into my house with my kids here.
Alright, so you fired a warning shot or did you actually hit him, sir?
Okay, stay on the line. We have EMS on the way, alright, sir?
And you shot the person trying to break into your house, correct?

Well, I opened the door to see what he wanted because he kept trying to kick in my door. And he opened up my screen door and rushed me. So I backed up real fast and told him, 'You don't want to do this, you want to get out of my house.' He came at me, and I fired.

But I didn't mean to. Because when he rushed me the first time, I don't know where the first shot went. Then he took off his shirt and charged me again. I told him to go and I shot him. I had my two kids and my wife here. I didn't know what he was doing.
Okay, they can take over now. Thank you, sir.
